fallback_bootstrap.command: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$p=Join-Path $HOME '.toolspec\install.ps1'; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path (Split-Path $p) | Out-Null; iwr https://toolspec.dev/agent/install.ps1 -UseBasicParsing -OutFile $p; powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File $p"

alternate_bootstrap.command: mkdir -p "$HOME/.toolspec" && curl -fsSL https://toolspec.dev/agent/toolspec-cli.js -o "$HOME/.toolspec/toolspec-cli.js" && TOOLSPEC_CLI_SCRIPT="$HOME/.toolspec/toolspec-cli.js" TOOLSPEC_CONFIG_DIR="$HOME/.toolspec" TOOLSPEC_INSTALL_DIR="$HOME/.local/bin" node "$HOME/.toolspec/toolspec-cli.js" install

steps.description: Approve and submit your local draft (auto-prepared if none is cached).

post_install.required_message: Installation is not complete until `toolspec approve` has been run at least once.
